passages.Body:
Jordy
And that’s how I discovered where the cold sore came from.  I have no idea how that came up?  Sorry, I talk a lot when I’m driving.
[[1-1]]
passages.Name: Cold Open

passages.Body:
Gina
Soo... 5 more minutes till the theater?
[[1-5]]

Jordy
Nope, 7 minutes. I missed two turns earlier.  Sorry.
[[Internal 1-1]]

Thoughts
Well this is awkward, hopefully not too awkward… Okay, probably too awkward.
[[Internal 1-2]]
passages.Name: Internal 1-1

passages.Body:
Anxiety
Just play it cool, maybe they won’t notice how much of a mess you are.  Think about it, you haven’t had the chance to embarrass yourself (delay) yet.
[[Internal 1-3]]
passages.Name: Internal 1-2

passages.Body:
Thoughts
Is that supposed to make me feel better?
[[Internal 1-4]]
passages.Name: Internal 1-3

passages.Body:
Anxiety
Look on the bright side, you’ve made a wonderful new friend.  This Dryve driver, Jordy, who is good at oversharing and not so good at driving..  Which is exactly why you came out on this date, to talk to the rideshare guy. 
[[Internal 1-5]]
passages.Name: Internal 1-4

passages.Body:
Player
No, this is salvageable, what do I do?
[[Question 1-1]]
passages.Name: Internal 1-5

passages.Body:
Player
No problem, the first few minutes are previews anyway.  Let it Ride.
passages.Name: Choice 1-1

passages.Body:
Player
Hey, I’ve got a joke!
passages.Name: Choice 1-2

passages.Body:
Player
[[Play it cool|Choice 1-1]]
[[Make a joke|Choice 1-2]]
[[Ask her about her day|Choice 1-3]]
[[Escape|Choice 1-4]]
passages.Name: Question 1-1
